greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows where T(m,n)=2mn + m + n - 5, 1<=n<=m.
comment: First column: A016789, second column: A016873, third column: A017041, fourth column: A017257. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 21 2012
mathematica: t[n_,k_]:= 2 n*k + n + k - 5; Table[t[n, k], {n, 15}, {k, n}]//Flatten (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 21 2012 *)
program: (MAGMA) [2*n*k + n + k - 5: k in [1..n], n in [1..11]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 21 2012
results.author: _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 24 2009
